children.subject: I think it should work now. Try it again.
It works now from what I see.
Thanks! Is it graded now? I don't see any points for those questions

How will we know if our answer for #4 was considered correct or not?  I have compared to the officially released answers and as usual my writing style is a little different so I'm always curious if I wrote my answer in an acceptable way (I certainly believe it is correct of course).

history.content:
For HW 2, we only graded the first 3 problems. The gradescope displays "ungraded" since we didn't grade the last problem (which is worth 0 pts). Everyone receives 0 on 4th problem, but that doesn't mean your answer is correct or incorrect.

The total points for your hw2 is 3 pts.

--------------------------------------------------------------

For future homework, we may only grade a subset of all problems.

We will post what problem we graded here:

HW 2: 1, 2, 3

HW 3: 1, 3, 4, 5
